summary: The NNSA Infrastructure Improvements Act of 2025 mandates the Administrator for Nuclear Security to submit annual reports to Congress, starting February 15, 2026, detailing future activities and resource needs for specialized infrastructure related to the nuclear stockpile, global security, and naval nuclear propulsion. These reports must include assessments of necessary infrastructure investments over the next 5, 6-15, and 16-25 fiscal years, along with cost estimates, schedules, workforce impacts, and explanations of project changes. The bill aims to modernize and expand infrastructure to meet nuclear modernization needs.
